CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Density functional theory ( DFT ) calculations was carried out to probe the molecular and electronic properties of the PffBB-n polymer by means of B3LYP / 6-311+(d,p) as a basis set in a vacuum using the repeating conjugated units of the polymer backbone in which all of the alkyl substitutions were replaced by ethyl groups to reduce the calculation time.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n polymer |
| ethyl groups |

Explanation:

1. PffBB-n polymer: This is a specific polymer mentioned in the paragraph, so it is a material.
2. ethyl groups: These are a type of alkyl substitution, which are mentioned as being replaced in the polymer backbone to reduce calculation time. Therefore, they are also a material.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n polymer |

Explanation:

1. PffBB-n polymer: This is the only clear material name mentioned in the paragraph.
2. The other entities mentioned (DFT, B3LYP / 6-311+(d,p), vacuum, repeating conjugated units, polymer backbone, alkyl substitutions) are not material names, but rather methods, basis sets, or properties related to the material.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Density functional theory ( DFT ) calculations was carried out to probe the molecular and electronic properties of the PffBB-n polymer by means of B3LYP / 6-311+(d,p) as a basis set in a vacuum using the repeating conjugated units of the polymer backbone in which all of the alkyl substitutions were replaced by ethyl groups to reduce the calculation time.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Density functional theory (DFT) |
| molecular and electronic properties |
| basis set |
| calculation time |

Explanation:

1. Density functional theory (DFT): This is a computational quantum mechanical modelling method used in physics, chemistry and materials science to investigate the electronic structure of many-body systems.
2. molecular and electronic properties: These are the properties of the PffBB-n polymer that were probed using DFT calculations.
3. basis set: This is a set of functions used to represent the wavefunction of a quantum mechanical system in computational chemistry.
4. calculation time: This is the time taken to perform the DFT calculations on the PffBB-n polymer.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| molecular and electronic properties |

Explanation:

1. molecular and electronic properties: These are the properties of the PffBB-n polymer that were probed using DFT calculations. These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties. The other entities, such as DFT, basis set, and calculation time, are methods or parameters used in the calculation, not material properties themselves.
